effect.x-y: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.
effect.omega-ruby-alpha-sapphire: This Pokémon cannot be confused. If a Pokémon is confused and acquires this ability, its confusion will immediately be healed.

flavor_text.x-y: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
